title: General intimacy interests
description: General intimacy interests—non-explicit, beginner-friendly signals about what styles you enjoy.

questions.text: I enjoy thoughtful presentation (music, lighting, tidy space) because it changes how intimacy feels.
questions.question_text: I enjoy thoughtful presentation (music, lighting, tidy space) because it changes how intimacy feels.

questions.text: I like trying small, new twists rather than repeating the exact same script.
questions.question_text: I like trying small, new twists rather than repeating the exact same script.

questions.text: I relax most when intimacy has a predictable rhythm or routine we both trust.
questions.question_text: I relax most when intimacy has a predictable rhythm or routine we both trust.

questions.text: A small ritual (a phrase, breath, or touch) helps me shift into a connected headspace.
questions.question_text: A small ritual (a phrase, breath, or touch) helps me shift into a connected headspace.

questions.text: Clear invitations or decisive moves feel kinder than prolonged indecision.
questions.question_text: Clear invitations or decisive moves feel kinder than prolonged indecision.

questions.text: Playful tension (banter, dares, mini-games) brings me alive.
questions.question_text: Playful tension (banter, dares, mini-games) brings me alive.

questions.text: Talking about meaning (what we want to feel, why it matters) deepens my desire.
questions.question_text: Talking about meaning (what we want to feel, why it matters) deepens my desire.

questions.text: I notice textures and pacing a lot; finesse can matter more than intensity.
questions.question_text: I notice textures and pacing a lot; finesse can matter more than intensity.

questions.text: I’m open to gently expanding my comfort zone with clear boundaries.
questions.question_text: I’m open to gently expanding my comfort zone with clear boundaries.

questions.text: After intimacy, I value simple co-regulation (water, warmth, a check-in) as much as the activity.
questions.question_text: After intimacy, I value simple co-regulation (water, warmth, a check-in) as much as the activity.
